Description:
Duynparc De Heeren van s Gravensande is located in the coast district sGravensande. It is built in the dunes and within walking distance of the North Sea beaches. WiFi access is available in this holiday park.

The accommodation will provide you with a TV, a garden and a patio.There is a well-equipped kitchen with a refrigerator and kitchenware. The private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower. Almost all various types of detached houses, built in Caribbean style, have one or more porches. This accommodation also offers a sandwich service.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out the beach (1 km) and Atlantikwall Museum (2.2 km). This holiday park is 55 km from Schiphol Airport. A seaside location, modern facilities and a range of luxurious services combine at Vlugtenburg. The bungalows, which are 300 metres from the beach,  have a flat-screen cable TV and WiFi is available.

Vlugtenburg offers bungalows with an open-plan living area with a sofa, dining area and an open-plan kitchen benefiting from a dishwasher, a microwave and coffee/tea making facilities. The bungalows also have their own private terrace with sun loungers and outdoor furniture.

Hoek van Holland is a 5-minute drive from Vlugtenburg and s-Gravenzandes city centre is a 30-minute walk away from the holiday park.

Description:
This welcoming 3-star hotel is situated in a historic building that was built in 1450 and is ideally located in the centre of s-Heerenberg.

The traditional atmosphere can be recognised throughout the whole of Hotel de Lantscroon; for example in the old ceilings, leaded light windows and traditional Dutch architecture.

There is an à la carte restaurant with various menus that are based on seasonal food. For your convenience the hotel has a lift, while rooms for the disabled are also available. Unique to the hotel is the famous library with many interesting books to read. Wi-Fi is also available. After a long day of business or site seeing you can relax in the hotels spa bath and sauna.

The central location and good facilities makes Hotel de Lantscroon a great place to stay when visiting this historic city on the Dutch-German border. Please note that use of the spa bath or sauna will incur and extra charge.

Description:
Kasteel Huis Bergh dates from the 12th Century and is located on an ancient fortified island in Heerenberg. It features private woodland gardens and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

The guest suites in Kasteel Huis Bergh are located in two old towers in the castles outer bailey. The suites are spread over two floors and each features a flat-screen TV, a kitchenette and a sun terrace.

Grand Café Heeren Dubbel has an international kitchen, which serves lunch and high tea in a picturesque setting.

Kasteel Huis Bergh is 4 km from Zeddam, where there is the only remaining working medieval tower mill in The Netherlands. Borghees Golf Club is just 4 km away, and it is 30 km to the historic town of Arnhem.

Kasteel Huis Bergh is 80 minutes drive from Eindhoven Airport. Free on-site car parking is available. Please inform Kasteel Huis Bergh in advance of your expected arrival time. This hotel is not accessible for wheelchairs.

Description:
Located 29 km from ADAM Lookout, Van der Valk Hotel Akersloot / A9 ALKMAAR offers 4-star accommodation in Akersloot and features a restaurant, a bar and a casino. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a terrace.

At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Van der Valk Hotel Akersloot / A9 ALKMAAR provides certain units that include a balcony, and rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and Dutch, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Amsterdam Central Station is 30 km from Van der Valk Hotel Akersloot / A9 ALKMAAR, while Anne Frank House is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

Description:
Located along the old River Boorne, this family-run hotel offers elegant guest rooms, a wonderful terrace on the water and a restaurant. Sloops to sail the Frisian lakes are available.

Dating back to 1886, the Hotel Restaurant Goerres provides you with a comfortable base in charming Akkrum, Heerenveen. Wake up with a nice and sweet breakfast, 14 eursos each person. and decide to rent a boat from the hotel. between 14 eurs each person.

You can take off for a sail through the surrounding Frisian lakes and villages. The hotels bicycles also offer a fun and active way of exploring the wider area. Benefit from free on-site parking for your car or boat.

The restaurant is known for its Frisian specialties, while the waterfront terrace is a great spot for a drink and a chat.

Just a few minutes from the railway station, Goerres offers excellent transport connections. From this property Heerenveen is 7 minutes away and Leeuwarden is 20 minutes away. Restaurant is closed from Wed 25 Jan 2023 until Fri 17 Feb 2023
Please note, the Hotel does not accept American Express for payment.

Please note that pets are not allowed.
